content:
I do not have personal preferences or experiences but there are several popular pizza places in new haven, connecticut including:

1. frank pepe pizzeria napoletana - known for their brick oven baked thin crust pizza

2. sally's apizza - serving coal-fired thin crust pizza since 1938

3. modern apizza - family-owned since 1930, serving a variety of specialty pizzas

4. bar - a brewery and pizza restaurant offering unique toppings and sauces on their thin crust pies

5. zuppardi's apizza - offering traditional thin crust pizza with a variety of toppings

it ultimately depends on personal taste and preference, so it's worth trying a few different places to find your favorite!
